name: Google Spreadsheet
description: The Google Spreadsheet connector allows you to work with spreadsheets on Google Drive, a free, web-based service that allows users to create and edit spreadsheet documents online while collaborating in real-time with other users. The connector uses the Google Spreadsheet API version v4 to connect to Google Drive and read, create, and update spreadsheets.

params.name: spreadsheetId
params.description: Unique identifier of the spreadsheet

params.name: ranges
params.description: The ranges to retrieve metadata for (optional)

params.name: includeGridData
params.description: Whether to include grid data in the response

params.name: fields
params.description: Specifying which fields to include in a partial response

params.name: responseVariable
params.description: Name of the variable to which the output of the operation should be assigned

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the output of the operation (This will remove the payload from the above variable).

params.description: Unique identifier of the spreadsheet

params.name: configMode
params.description: Select the Configuration Mode. BASIC shows essential fields, ADVANCED shows all options. Supported values: BASIC, ADVANCED

params.name: spreadsheetId
params.description: Unique identifier of the spreadsheet

params.name: sheetName
params.description: Name of the sheet (tab) containing the cell (e.g. Sheet1)

params.name: cellId
params.description: The cell ID in A1 notation (e.g. A1, B2, etc)

params.name: range
params.description: The A1 notation of the cell range to retrieve (e.g. Sheet1!A1)

params.name: valueRenderOption
params.description: How values should be rendered in the output Supported values: FORMATTED_VALUE, UNFORMATTED_VALUE, FORMULA

params.name: dateTimeRenderOption
params.description: How dates, times, and durations should be represented Supported values: SERIAL_NUMBER, FORMATTED_STRING

params.name: majorDimension
params.description: The major dimension of the values Supported values: ROWS, COLUMNS

params.description: How the input data should be interpreted Supported values: RAW, USER_ENTERED

params.description: The data to write. Should be an array of update objects containing range and values. Format: [{range: 'Sheet1!A1:B2', values: [[1,2],[3,4]]}, ...]

params.description: Select the Configuration Mode for the operation. BASIC will show only the basic attributes, while ADVANCED will show all attributes. Supported values: BASIC, ADVANCED

params.name: title
params.description: Title of the spreadsheet to be created.

params.name: initialSheetName
params.description: Name of the initial sheet to be created in the spreadsheet.

params.name: properties
params.description: Properties of the spreadsheet like title. Format: {"title": "My Spreadsheet"}

params.name: sheets
params.description: List of sheets to create in the spreadsheet. Format: [{"properties": {"title": "Sheet1"}}]

params.name: namedRanges
params.description: Named ranges to create in the spreadsheet

params.description: Specifying which fields to include in a partial response

params.name: spreadsheetId
params.description: ID of the spreadsheet to be created. If not provided, a new spreadsheet will be created.

params.name: range
params.description: The A1 notation of where to append the data (e.g. 'Sheet1!A:B' for columns A-B)

params.name: values
params.description: The data to append. Should be an array of arrays. Each inner array represents a row.

params.name: insertDataOption
params.description: How the input data should be inserted. OVERWRITE: Overwrites data. INSERT_ROWS: Inserts new rows for the data. Supported values: OVERWRITE, INSERT_ROWS

params.name: valueInputOption
params.description: How the input data should be interpreted Supported values: RAW, USER_ENTERED

params.name: majorDimension
params.description: The major dimension that results should use Supported values: ROWS, COLUMNS

params.name: fields
params.description: Specifying which fields to include in a partial response

params.name: responseVariable
params.description: Name of the variable to which the output of the operation should be assigned

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the output of the operation (This will remove the payload from the above variable).

params.description: Unique identifier of the spreadsheet

params.name: requests
params.description: Array of insert dimension requests. Format: [{insertDimension: {range: {sheetId: 0, dimension: "ROWS", startIndex: 0, endIndex: 2}, inheritFromBefore: true}}]

params.description: Specifying which fields to include in a partial response

params.name: connectionName
params.description: The name for the Google Sheets connection

params.name: clientId
params.description: Client ID used to connect with Google Sheets

params.name: clientSecret
params.description: Client Secret to connect with Google Sheets

params.name: refreshToken
params.description: Refresh Token used to connect with Google Sheets

params.name: apiUrl
params.description: API URL used to connect with Google Sheets

params.name: tokenEndpoint
params.description: Token URL used to connect with Google Sheets

operations.name: init
operations.description: Get the basic details of API

operations.name: getAccessTokenFromRefreshToken
operations.description: Get the access token from refresh token

operations.name: getSheetMetaData
operations.description: provides a feed to access the sheet metadata contained within a given spreadsheet.

operations.name: addSheetBatchRequest
operations.description: Add a sheet or multiple sheets to a spreadsheet.

operations.name: deleteSheetBatchRequest
operations.description: Remove a sheet or multiple sheets from a given spreadsheet.

operations.name: copyTo
operations.description: Copies a single sheet from a spreadsheet to another spreadsheet.

operations.name: deleteDimensionBatchRequest
operations.description: removing rows, columns and remove part of a row or column.

operations.name: getCellData
operations.description: Retrieve any set of cell data from a sheet and cell contents as input values (as would be entered by a user at a keyboard) and/or the outputs of formula (if numeric)

operations.name: getMultipleCellData
operations.description: Retrieve any set of cell data including multiple ranges from a sheet and cell contents as input values (as would be entered by a user at a keyboard) and/or the outputs of formula (if numeric)

operations.name: editCell
operations.description: Edit the content of the cell with new values.

operations.name: editMultipleCell
operations.description: Edit the content of multiple cell with new values.

operations.name: updateCellsBatchRequest
operations.description: Updates all cells in a range with new data that can be cell value, formatting.

operations.name: appendDimensionBatchRequest
operations.description: Append empty rows or columns at the end of the sheet.

operations.name: repeatCellsBatchRequest
operations.description: Repeat formatting of the cell into over a range of cells.

operations.name: mergeCellsBatchRequest
operations.description: Merge range of cells into a one cell.

operations.name: setDataValidationBatchRequest
operations.description: Apply data validation rule to a range.

operations.name: copyPasteBatchRequest
operations.description: Copy cell formatting in one range and paste it into another range on the same sheet.

operations.name: cutPasteBatchRequest
operations.description: cuts the one range and pastes its data, formats, formulas, and merges to the another range on the same sheet.

operations.name: updateConditionalFormatRuleBatchRequest
operations.description: Update a conditional formatting rule or its priority.

operations.name: addConditionalFormatRuleBatchRequest
operations.description: Establishes a new conditional formatting rule.

operations.name: updateDimensionPropertiesBatchRequest
operations.description: Adjust column width or row height.

operations.name: insertDimensionBatchRequest
operations.description: Insert an empty row or column at the end or in the middle.

operations.name: moveDimensionBatchRequest
operations.description: Move a row or column / range of rows or columns.

operations.name: sortRangeBatchRequest
operations.description: Sort a range with multiple sorting specifications.
